ThingDef.label: bionic beak
ThingDef.description: An artificial beak replacement. Made out of biosynthetic bone, with plasteel tooth replacements and a set of micro servomotors for the full range of motion.

ThingDef.label: bionic trunk
ThingDef.description: An artificial trunk replacement. Made of synthetic smooth-fibers and connected through a neurogel interface, it can match the performance of a natural trunk in manipulation.
